query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?name ?id ?text ?cnid ?seq ?x ?y WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:ConnectivityNode.ConnectivityNodeContainer ?sys. ?s r:type c:ConnectivityNode. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cnid. ?tdo c:DiagramObject.IdentifiedObject ?s. ?tdo c:TextDiagramObject.text ?text. ?tdo c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?tdo c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?pt c:DiagramObjectPoint.DiagramObject ?tdo. ?pt c:DiagramObjectPoint.sequenceNumber ?seq. ?pt c:DiagramObjectPoint.xPosition ?x. ?pt c:DiagramObjectPoint.yPosition ?y. } ORDER by ?name ?seq

SELECT ?name ?type ?bus ?ratedS ?ratedU ?p ?q ?maxP ?minP ?maxQ ?minQ ?inertia ?Xd ?Xdp ?Xdpp ?Xq ?Xqp ?Xqpp ?Ra ?Xl ?Tdop ?Tdopp ?Tqop ?Tqopp ?id ?uid ?sysid ?cn1id WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:SynchronousMachine. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:RotatingMachine.ratedS ?ratedS. ?s c:RotatingMachine.ratedU ?ratedU. ?s c:RotatingMachine.p ?p. ?s c:RotatingMachine.q ?q. ?s c:RotatingMachine.GeneratingUnit ?unit. ?unit c:GeneratingUnit.maxOperatingP ?maxP. ?unit c:GeneratingUnit.minOperatingP ?minP. ?unit c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?uid. {?unit a ?rawtype. bind(strafter(str(?rawtype),"#") as ?postfix) bind(strbefore(str(?postfix),"GeneratingUnit") as ?type)} ?s c:SynchronousMachine.maxQ ?maxQ. ?s c:SynchronousMachine.minQ ?minQ. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?s. ?dyn c:RotatingMachineDynamics.inertia ?inertia. ?dyn c:RotatingMachineDynamics.statorResistance ?Ra. ?dyn c:RotatingMachineDynamics.statorLeakageReactance ?Xl. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xDirectSync ?Xd. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xDirectTrans ?Xdp. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xDirectSubtrans ?Xdpp. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xQuadSync ?Xq. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xQuadTrans ?Xqp. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.xQuadSubtrans ?Xqpp. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.tpdo ?Tdop. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.tppdo ?Tdopp. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.tpqo ?Tqop. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineTimeConstantReactance.tppqo ?Tqopp. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

SELECT ?name ?id ?basev ?bus1 ?bus2 ?len ?r ?x ?b ?r0 ?x0 ?b0 ?sysid ?cn1id ?cn2id WHERE { ?s r:type c:ACLineSegment. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s c:Conductor.length ?len. ?s c:ACLineSegment.r ?r. ?s c:ACLineSegment.x ?x. ?s c:ACLineSegment.bch ?b. ?s c:ACLineSegment.r0 ?r0. ?s c:ACLineSegment.x0 ?x0. ?s c:ACLineSegment.b0ch ?b0. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn1. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.ToConnectivityNode ?cn2. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus1. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn2id. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus2 } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?bus1 ?bus2 ?basev ?id ?sysid ?cn1id ?cn2id WHERE { ?s r:type c:DisconnectingCircuitBreaker. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn1. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.ToConnectivityNode ?cn2. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus1. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn2id. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus2 } ORDER by ?name

SELECT ?name ?id ?bus ?basev ?r ?x ?r0 ?x0 ?nomv ?vmag ?vang ?sysid ?cn1id WHERE { ?s r:type c:EnergySource. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s c:EnergySource.r ?r. ?s c:EnergySource.x ?x. ?s c:EnergySource.r0 ?r0. ?s c:EnergySource.x0 ?x0. ?s c:EnergySource.nominalVoltage ?nomv. ?s c:EnergySource.voltageMagnitude ?vmag. ?s c:EnergySource.voltageAngle ?vang. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

query.description: series capacitor or reactor
query.value: SELECT ?name ?bus1 ?bus2 ?basev ?r ?r0 ?x ?x0 ?id ?sysid ?cn1id ?cn2id WHERE { ?s r:type c:SeriesCompensator. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s c:SeriesCompensator.r ?r. ?s c:SeriesCompensator.r0 ?r0. ?s c:SeriesCompensator.x ?x. ?s c:SeriesCompensator.x0 ?x0. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn1. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.ToConnectivityNode ?cn2. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn1 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus1. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn2id. ?cn2 c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus2 } ORDER by ?name

query.description: Power transformers on their own, without catalog reference.
query.value: SELECT ?id ?pname ?vgrp ?enum ?bus ?basev ?conn ?ratedS ?ratedU ?ang ?grounded ?rground ?xground ?cn1id ?pid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p r:type c:PowerTransformer. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?pname. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?pid. ?p c:PowerTransformer.vectorGroup ?vgrp. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?end c:TransformerEnd.endNumber ?enum. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.ratedS ?ratedS. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.ratedU ?ratedU. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.phaseAngleClock ?ang. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.connectionKind ?connraw. bind(strafter(str(?connraw),"WindingConnection.") as ?conn) ?end c:TransformerEnd.grounded ?grounded. OPTIONAL {?end c:TransformerEnd.rground ?rground.} OPTIONAL {?end c:TransformerEnd.xground ?xground.} ?end c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?end e:TransformerEnd.ConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus. ?end c:TransformerEnd.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev } ORDER BY ?pname ?enum

SELECT ?pname ?enum ?b ?g ?id ?eid ?pid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p r:type c:PowerTransformer. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?pname. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?adm c:TransformerCoreAdmittance.TransformerEnd ?end. ?end c:TransformerEnd.endNumber ?enum. ?adm c:TransformerCoreAdmittance.b ?b. ?adm c:TransformerCoreAdmittance.g ?g. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?pid. ?end c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eid. ?adm c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id } ORDER BY ?pname

query.description: Off-nominal tap in percent.
query.value: SELECT ?pname ?enum ?svi ?step ?eid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?pname. ?rtc r:type c:RatioTapChanger. ?rtc c:RatioTapChanger.TransformerEnd ?end. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?end c:TransformerEnd.endNumber ?enum. ?rtc c:RatioTapChanger.stepVoltageIncrement ?svi. ?rtc c:TapChanger.step ?step. ?end c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eid. } ORDER BY ?pname ?enum

SELECT ?pname ?fnum ?tnum ?r ?x ?pid ?fid ?tid ?id WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p r:type c:PowerTransformer. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?pname. ?from c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?imp c:TransformerMeshImpedance.FromTransformerEnd ?from. ?imp c:TransformerMeshImpedance.ToTransformerEnd ?to. ?imp c:TransformerMeshImpedance.r ?r. ?imp c:TransformerMeshImpedance.x ?x. ?from c:TransformerEnd.endNumber ?fnum. ?to c:TransformerEnd.endNumber ?tnum. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?pid. ?from c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?fid. ?to c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?tid. ?imp c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id } ORDER BY ?pname ?fnum ?tnum

SELECT ?pname ?admid ?amps ?vs ?pid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p r:type c:PowerTransformer. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?pname. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?pid. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?adm c:TransformerCoreAdmittance.TransformerEnd ?end. ?adm c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?admid. ?sat e:TransformerSaturation.TransformerCoreAdmittance ?adm. ?crv c:CurveData.Curve ?sat. ?crv c:CurveData.xvalue ?xvalue. ?crv c:CurveData.y1value ?y1value. bind(xsd:string(?xvalue) as ?xstr) bind(xsd:float(?xstr) as ?amps) bind(xsd:string(?y1value) as ?ystr) bind(xsd:float(?ystr) as ?vs) } ORDER BY ?pid ?amps ?vs

query.description: list all the transmission systems

query.value: SELECT ?name ?bus ?ratedS ?ratedU ?maxP ?minP ?maxQ ?minQ ?ipu ?p ?q ?sysid ?id ?unitid ?cn1id WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:PhotoVoltaicUnit. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?unitid. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.maxP ?maxP. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.minP ?minP. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.PowerElectronicsConnection ?pec. ?pec c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.ratedS ?ratedS. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.ratedU ?ratedU. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.maxIFault ?ipu. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.p ?p. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.q ?q. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.minQ ?minQ. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.maxQ ?maxQ. ?pec c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?pec e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

SELECT ?name ?bus ?ratedS ?ratedU ?maxP ?minP ?maxQ ?minQ ?ipu ?p ?q ?sysid ?id ?unitid ?cn1id WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:PowerElectronicsWindUnit. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?unitid. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.maxP ?maxP. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.minP ?minP. ?s c:PowerElectronicsUnit.PowerElectronicsConnection ?pec. ?pec c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.ratedS ?ratedS. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.ratedU ?ratedU. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.maxIFault ?ipu. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.p ?p. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.q ?q. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.minQ ?minQ. ?pec c:PowerElectronicsConnection.maxQ ?maxQ. ?pec c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?pec e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

SELECT ?name ?ilr ?ka ?kc ?kf ?klr ?ta ?tb ?tb1 ?tc ?tc1 ?tf ?vamax ?vamin ?vimax ?vimin ?vrmax ?vrmin ?xe ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:ExcST1A. ?s c:ExcitationSystemDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:ExcST1A. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ExcST1A.ilr ?ilr. ?s c:ExcST1A.ka ?ka. ?s c:ExcST1A.kc ?kc. ?s c:ExcST1A.kf ?kf. ?s c:ExcST1A.klr ?klr. ?s c:ExcST1A.ta ?ta. ?s c:ExcST1A.tb ?tb. ?s c:ExcST1A.tb1 ?tb1. ?s c:ExcST1A.tc ?tc. ?s c:ExcST1A.tc1 ?tc1. ?s c:ExcST1A.tf ?tf. ?s c:ExcST1A.vamax ?vamax. ?s c:ExcST1A.vamin ?vamin. ?s c:ExcST1A.vimax ?vimax. ?s c:ExcST1A.vimin ?vimin. ?s c:ExcST1A.vrmax ?vrmax. ?s c:ExcST1A.vrmin ?vrmin. ?s c:ExcST1A.xe ?xe. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?k1 ?k2 ?k3 ?pmin ?pmax ?t1 ?t2 ?t3 ?t4 ?t5 ?t6 ?mwbase ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:GovSteamSGO. ?s c:TurbineGovernorDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:GovSteamSGO. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.k1 ?k1. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.k2 ?k2. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.k3 ?k3. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.pmin ?pmin. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.pmax ?pmax. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t1 ?t1. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t2 ?t2. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t3 ?t3. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t4 ?t4. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t5 ?t5. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.t6 ?t6. ?s c:GovSteamSGO.mwbase ?mwbase. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?a1 ?a2 ?inputSignalType ?ks ?t1 ?t2 ?t3 ?t4 ?t5 ?t6 ?vrmax ?vrmin ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:PssIEEE1A. ?s c:PowerSystemStabilizerDynamics.ExcitationSystemDynamics ?exc. ?exc c:ExcitationSystemDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:PssIEEE1A. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.a1 ?a1. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.a2 ?a2. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.inputSignalType ?inputSignalRaw. bind(strafter(str(?inputSignalRaw),"InputSignalKind.") as ?inputSignalType) ?s c:PssIEEE1A.ks ?ks. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t1 ?t1. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t2 ?t2. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t3 ?t3. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t4 ?t4. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t5 ?t5. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.t6 ?t6. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.vrmax ?vrmax. ?s c:PssIEEE1A.vrmin ?vrmin. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?brkpt ?iolim ?iqrmax ?iqrmin ?ivpl1 ?ivplsw ?ivpnt0 ?ivpnt1 ?khv ?rrpwr ?tfltr ?tg ?volim ?zerox ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:WeccREGCA. ?s c:WeccDynamics.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:WeccREGCA. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:WeccREGCA.brkpt ?brkpt. ?s c:WeccREGCA.iolim ?iolim. ?s c:WeccREGCA.iqrmax ?iqrmax. ?s c:WeccREGCA.iqrmin ?iqrmin. ?s c:WeccREGCA.ivpl1 ?ivpl1. ?s c:WeccREGCA.ivplsw ?ivplsw. ?s c:WeccREGCA.ivpnt0 ?ivpnt0. ?s c:WeccREGCA.ivpnt1 ?ivpnt1. ?s c:WeccREGCA.khv ?khv. ?s c:WeccREGCA.rrpwr ?rrpwr. ?s c:WeccREGCA.tfltr ?tfltr. ?s c:WeccREGCA.tg ?tg. ?s c:WeccREGCA.volim ?volim. ?s c:WeccREGCA.zerox ?zerox. } ORDER BY ?name

?vdi1i4 ?vdi1v1 ?vdi1v2 ?vdi1v3 ?vdi1v4 ?vdi2i1 ?vdi2i2 ?vdi2i3 ?vdi2i4 ?vdi2v1 ?vdi2v2 ?vdi2v3 ?vdi2v4 ?vdip ?vFlag ?vmax ?vmin ?vref0 ?vref1 ?vup ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:WeccREECA. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:WeccREECA.db1 ?db1. ?s c:WeccREECA.db2 ?db2. ?s c:WeccREECA.dPmax ?dPmax. ?s c:WeccREECA.dPmin ?dPmin. ?s ?qFlag. ?s c:WeccREECA.qmax ?qmax. ?s c:WeccREECA.qmin ?qmin. ?s c:WeccREECA.thld ?thld. ?s c:WeccREECA.thld2 ?thld2. ?s c:WeccREECA.tiq ?tiq. ?s c:WeccREECA.tp ?tp. ?s c:WeccREECA.tpord ?tpord. ?s ?vmax. ?s c:WeccREECA.vmin ?vmin. ?s c:WeccREECA.vref0 ?vref0. ?s c:WeccREECA.vref1 ?vref1. ?s c:WeccREECA.vup ?vup. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?db ?ddn ?dup ?emax ?emin ?fdbd1 ?fdbd2 ?femax ?femin ?frqFlag ?kc ?ki ?kig ?kp ?kpg ?pmax ?pmin ?qmax ?qmin ?rc ?refFlag ?tfltr ?tft ?tfv ?tlag ?tp ?vcmpFlag ?vfrz ?xc ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:WeccREPCA. ?s c:WeccDynamics.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:WeccREPCA. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:WeccREPCA.db ?db. ?s c:WeccREPCA.ddn ?ddn. ?s c:WeccREPCA.dup ?dup. ?s c:WeccREPCA.emax ?emax. ?s c:WeccREPCA.emin ?emin. ?s c:WeccREPCA.fdbd1 ?fdbd1. ?s c:WeccREPCA.fdbd2 ?fdbd2. ?s c:WeccREPCA.femax ?femax. ?s c:WeccREPCA.femin ?femin. ?s c:WeccREPCA.frqFlag ?frqFlag. ?s c:WeccREPCA.kc ?kc. ?s c:WeccREPCA.ki ?ki. ?s c:WeccREPCA.kig ?kig. ?s c:WeccREPCA.kp ?kp. ?s c:WeccREPCA.kpg ?kpg. ?s c:WeccREPCA.pmax ?pmax. ?s c:WeccREPCA.pmin ?pmin. ?s c:WeccREPCA.qmax ?qmax. ?s c:WeccREPCA.qmin ?qmin. ?s c:WeccREPCA.rc ?rc. ?s c:WeccREPCA.refFlag ?refFlag. ?s c:WeccREPCA.tfltr ?tfltr. ?s c:WeccREPCA.tft ?tft. ?s c:WeccREPCA.tfv ?tfv. ?s c:WeccREPCA.tlag ?tlag. ?s c:WeccREPCA.tp ?tp. ?s c:WeccREPCA.vcmpFlag ?vcmpFlag. ?s c:WeccREPCA.vfrz ?vfrz. ?s c:WeccREPCA.xc ?xc. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?dshaft ?hg ?ht ?kshaft ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:WeccWTGTA. ?s c:WeccDynamics.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:WeccWTGTA. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:WeccWTGTA.dshaft ?dshaft. ?s c:WeccWTGTA.hg ?hg. ?s c:WeccWTGTA.ht ?ht. ?s c:WeccWTGTA.kshaft ?kshaft. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?ka ?t0 ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:WeccWTGARA. ?s c:WeccDynamics.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:WeccWTGARA. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:WeccWTGARA.ka ?ka. ?s c:WeccWTGARA.t0 ?t0. } ORDER BY ?name

query.description: Shunt reactor or capacitor
query.value: SELECT ?name ?basev ?nomu ?gsection ?bsection ?sections ?maxsections ?bus ?id ?sysid ?cn1id WHERE { ?s r:type c:LinearShuntCompensator. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s c:ShuntCompensator.nomU ?nomu. ?s c:LinearShuntCompensator.gPerSection ?gsection. ?s c:LinearShuntCompensator.bPerSection ?bsection. ?s c:ShuntCompensator.sections ?sections. ?s c:ShuntCompensator.maximumSections ?maxsections. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

query.description: Balanced on three phases
query.value: SELECT ?name ?id ?bus ?basev ?p ?q ?pz ?qz ?pi ?qi ?pp ?qp ?pe ?qe ?sysid ?cn1id WHERE { ?s r:type c:EnergyConsumer. ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ConductingEquipment.BaseVoltage ?bv. ?bv c:BaseVoltage.nominalVoltage ?basev. ?s c:EnergyConsumer.p ?p. ?s c:EnergyConsumer.q ?q. ?s c:EnergyConsumer.LoadResponse ?lr. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantImpedance ?pz. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantImpedance ?qz. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantCurrent ?pi. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantCurrent ?qi. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pConstantPower ?pp. ?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qConstantPower ?qp. OPTIONAL {?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.pVoltageExponent ?pe.} OPTIONAL {?lr c:LoadResponseCharacteristic.qVoltageExponent ?qe.} ?s e:ConductingEquipment.FromConnectivityNode ?cn. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cn1id. ?cn c:IdentifiedObject.name ?bus } ORDER by ?name

query.description: for EMTPowerXfmrWinding
query.value: SELECT ?id (count(?p) as ?count) WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?p r:type c:PowerTransformer. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?id. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. } GROUP BY ?id ORDER BY ?id

query.description: operational limits for transformer windings
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?endid ?tname ?value ?dur ?inf ?dir WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?p. ?end c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?endid. ?ols e:OperationalLimitSet.TransformerEnd ?end. ?s c:OperationalLimit.OperationalLimitSet ?ols. ?s c:OperationalLimit.OperationalLimitType ?olt. ?s r:type c:ApparentPowerLimit. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:ApparentPowerLimit.value ?valstr. bind(xsd:string(?valstr) as ?xsdstr) bind(xsd:float(?xsdstr) as ?value) ?olt c:IdentifiedObject.name ?tname. ?olt c:OperationalLimitType.isInfiniteDuration ?inf. ?olt c:OperationalLimitType.direction ?rawdir. bind(strafter(str(?rawdir), "OperationalLimitDirectionKind.") as ?dir) OPTIONAL {?olt c:OperationalLimitType.acceptableDuration ?dur.} } ORDER BY ?endid ?inf ?tname ?inf ?value

query.description: operational limits for conducting equipment
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?eqid ?eqtype ?tname ?value ?dur ?inf ?dir WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?eq r:type ?typeraw. bind(strafter(str(?typeraw),"#") as ?eqtype) ?ols e:OperationalLimitSet.ConductingEquipment ?eq. ?s c:OperationalLimit.OperationalLimitSet ?ols. ?s c:OperationalLimit.OperationalLimitType ?olt. ?s r:type c:ApparentPowerLimit. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:ApparentPowerLimit.value ?valstr. bind(xsd:string(?valstr) as ?xsdstr) bind(xsd:float(?xsdstr) as ?value) ?olt c:IdentifiedObject.name ?tname. ?olt c:OperationalLimitType.isInfiniteDuration ?inf. ?olt c:OperationalLimitType.direction ?rawdir. bind(strafter(str(?rawdir), "OperationalLimitDirectionKind.") as ?dir) OPTIONAL {?olt c:OperationalLimitType.acceptableDuration ?dur.} } ORDER BY ?eqid ?inf ?tname ?inf ?value

query.description: Bus voltages from power flow in a merged instance
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?cnid ?name ?vmag ?vdeg WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:ConnectivityNode.ConnectivityNodeContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?cnid. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?sv e:SvVoltage.ConnectivityNode ?s. ?sv c:SvVoltage.v ?vmag. ?sv c:SvVoltage.angle ?vdeg } ORDER BY ?name

query.description: Branch power flows in a merged instance
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?eqid ?eqtype ?eqname ?p ?q WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?eqname. ?s r:type ?typeraw. bind(strafter(str(?typeraw),"#") as ?eqtype) ?sv e:SvPowerFlow.ConductingEquipment ?s. ?sv c:SvPowerFlow.p ?p. ?sv c:SvPowerFlow.q ?q } ORDER BY ?eqtype ?eqname

query.description: Transformer winding (end) power flows in a merged instance
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?endid ?endtype ?endname ?p ?q WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?pxf c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?end c:PowerTransformerEnd.PowerTransformer ?pxf. ?end c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?endid. ?end c:IdentifiedObject.name ?endname. ?end r:type ?typeraw. bind(strafter(str(?typeraw),"#") as ?endtype) ?sv e:SvPowerFlow.TransformerEnd ?end. ?sv c:SvPowerFlow.p ?p. ?sv c:SvPowerFlow.q ?q } ORDER BY ?endtype ?endname

query.description: Bus voltages from power flow in a standalone file. Don't select the system.
Branch power flows in a standalone file. Don't select the system.
Transformer winding (end) power flows in a standalone file. Don't select the system.
Collection of equipment comprising an inverter-based resource plant, with plant-level attributes.
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?eqid ?eqtype WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p r:type e:IBRPlant. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?p e:GeneratingPlant.Equipments ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. {?eq a ?rawtype. bind(strafter(str(?rawtype),"#") as ?eqtype)} } ORDER by ?id ?eqtype ?eqid

query.description: Collection of equipment comprising a conventional generating plant.
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?eqid ?eqtype WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p r:type e:RotatingMachinePlant. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?p e:GeneratingPlant.Equipments ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. {?eq a ?rawtype. bind(strafter(str(?rawtype),"#") as ?eqtype)} } ORDER by ?id ?eqtype ?eqid

SELECT ?name ?efd1 ?efd2 ?exclim ?ka ?ke ?kf ?seefd1 ?seefd2 ?ta ?tb ?tc ?te ?tf ?uelin ?vrmax ?vrmin ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:ExcIEEEDC1A. ?s c:ExcitationSystemDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:ExcIEEEDC1A. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.efd1 ?efd1. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.efd2 ?efd2. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.exclim ?exclim. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.ka ?ka. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.ke ?ke. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.kf ?kf. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.seefd1 ?seefd1. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.seefd2 ?seefd2. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.ta ?ta. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.tb ?tb. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.tc ?tc. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.te ?te. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.tf ?tf. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.uelin ?uelin. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.vrmax ?vrmax. ?s c:ExcIEEEDC1A.vrmin ?vrmin. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?efdmax ?efdmin ?emax ?emin ?k ?kc ?tatb ?tb ?tc ?te ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:ExcSEXS. ?s c:ExcitationSystemDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:ExcSEXS. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:ExcSEXS.efdmax ?efdmax. ?s c:ExcSEXS.efdmin ?efdmin. ?s c:ExcSEXS.emax ?emax. ?s c:ExcSEXS.emin ?emin. ?s c:ExcSEXS.k ?k. ?s c:ExcSEXS.kc ?kc. ?s c:ExcSEXS.tatb ?tatb. ?s c:ExcSEXS.tb ?tb. ?s c:ExcSEXS.tc ?tc. ?s c:ExcSEXS.te ?te. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?at ?dturb ?kt ?mwbase ?r ?t1 ?t2 ?t3 ?vmax ?vmin ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:GovGAST. ?s c:TurbineGovernorDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:GovGAST. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:GovGAST.at ?at. ?s c:GovGAST.dturb ?dturb. ?s c:GovGAST.kt ?kt. ?s c:GovGAST.mwbase ?mwbase. ?s c:GovGAST.r ?r. ?s c:GovGAST.t1 ?t1. ?s c:GovGAST.t2 ?t2. ?s c:GovGAST.t3 ?t3. ?s c:GovGAST.vmax ?vmax. ?s c:GovGAST.vmin ?vmin. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?at ?dturb ?gmax ?gmin ?hdam ?mwbase ?qnl ?rperm ?rtemp ?tf ?tg ?tr ?tw ?velm ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:GovHydro1. ?s c:TurbineGovernorDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:GovHydro1. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:GovHydro1.at ?at. ?s c:GovHydro1.dturb ?dturb. ?s c:GovHydro1.gmax ?gmax. ?s c:GovHydro1.gmin ?gmin. ?s c:GovHydro1.hdam ?hdam. ?s c:GovHydro1.mwbase ?mwbase. ?s c:GovHydro1.qnl ?qnl. ?s c:GovHydro1.rperm ?rperm. ?s c:GovHydro1.rtemp ?rtemp. ?s c:GovHydro1.tf ?tf. ?s c:GovHydro1.tg ?tg. ?s c:GovHydro1.tr ?tr. ?s c:GovHydro1.tw ?tw. ?s c:GovHydro1.velm ?velm. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?dt ?mwbase ?r ?t1 ?t2 ?t3 ?vmax ?vmin ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:GovSteam0. ?s c:TurbineGovernorDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:GovSteam0. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:GovSteam0.dt ?dt. ?s c:GovSteam0.mwbase ?mwbase. ?s c:GovSteam0.r ?r. ?s c:GovSteam0.t1 ?t1. ?s c:GovSteam0.t2 ?t2. ?s c:GovSteam0.t3 ?t3. ?s c:GovSteam0.vmax ?vmax. ?s c:GovSteam0.vmin ?vmin. } ORDER BY ?name

SELECT ?name ?a1 ?a2 ?a3 ?a4 ?a5 ?a6 ?a7 ?a8 ?inputSignalType ?kd ?ks ?t1 ?t2 ?t3 ?t4 ?t5 ?t6 ?tdelay ?vcl ?vcu ?vrmax ?vrmin ?id ?eqid ?sysid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?s r:type c:Pss1A. ?s c:PowerSystemStabilizerDynamics.ExcitationSystemDynamics ?exc. ?exc c:ExcitationSystemDynamics.SynchronousMachineDynamics ?dyn. ?dyn c:SynchronousMachineDynamics.SynchronousMachine ?eq. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?eqid. ?s r:type c:Pss1A. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?s c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?s c:Pss1A.a1 ?a1. ?s c:Pss1A.a2 ?a2. ?s c:Pss1A.a3 ?a3. ?s c:Pss1A.a4 ?a4. ?s c:Pss1A.a5 ?a5. ?s c:Pss1A.a6 ?a6. ?s c:Pss1A.a7 ?a7. ?s c:Pss1A.a8 ?a8. ?s c:Pss1A.inputSignalType ?inputSignalType. ?s c:Pss1A.kd ?kd. ?s c:Pss1A.ks ?ks. ?s c:Pss1A.t1 ?t1. ?s c:Pss1A.t2 ?t2. ?s c:Pss1A.t3 ?t3. ?s c:Pss1A.t4 ?t4. ?s c:Pss1A.t5 ?t5. ?s c:Pss1A.t6 ?t6. ?s c:Pss1A.tdelay ?tdelay. ?s c:Pss1A.vcl ?vcl. ?s c:Pss1A.vcu ?vcu. ?s c:Pss1A.vrmax ?vrmax. ?s c:Pss1A.vrmin ?vrmin. } ORDER BY ?name

query.description: List the values and sizes of parameters for the DLL interfaces.
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?seq ?kind ?val WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?eq r:type c:PowerElectronicsConnection. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?d c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?p e:IEEECigreDLLParameter.IEEECigreDLL ?d. ?p e:IEEECigreDLLParameter.sequenceNumber ?seq. ?p e:IEEECigreDLLParameter.value ?val. {?p e:IEEECigreDLLParameter.parameterKind ?rawkind. bind(strafter(str(?rawkind),"Kind.") as ?kind)} } ORDER by ?id ?seq

query.description: Counts the number of parameters in each DLL interface.
query.value: SELECT ?id (count(?p) as ?count) WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?eq r:type c:PowerElectronicsConnection. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?d c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?p e:IEEECigreDLLParameter.IEEECigreDLL ?d. } GROUP BY ?id ORDER BY ?id

query.description: DLL interface attached to an inverter.
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?pecid ?datetime ?version ?emt ?rms ?dt ?uri ?snapshotUri ?vendor WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?eq r:type c:PowerElectronicsConnection. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?pecid. ?d c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?d c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.firmwareInstalled ?datetime. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.firmwareVersion ?version. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.supportsEMT ?emt. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.supportsRMS ?rms. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.timestep ?dt. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.uri ?uri. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.snapshotUri ?snapshotUri. ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.vendorName ?vendor. } ORDER by ?id

query.description: IBR plant attributes, keyed on the inverter ID for convenience.
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name ?plantid ?dcV ?dcCap ?acRgrid ?acLgrid ?acCap ?acRbridge ?acLbridge ?swtFreq ?filterKind ?dllid WHERE { ?sys c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?sysid. ?p r:type e:IBRPlant. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.name ?name. ?p c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?plantid. ?p e:GeneratingPlant.Equipments ?eq. ?eq r:type c:PowerElectronicsConnection. ?eq c:Equipment.EquipmentContainer ?sys. ?eq c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?id. ?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterCapacitance ?acCap. ?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterRgrid ?acRgrid. ?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterLgrid ?acLgrid. ?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterRbridge ?acRbridge. ?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterLbridge ?acLbridge. ?p e:IBRPlant.dcLinkCapacitance ?dcCap. ?p e:IBRPlant.dcLinkVoltage ?dcV. ?p e:IBRPlant.switchingFrequency ?swtFreq. {?p e:IBRPlant.acFilterKind ?rawkind. bind(strafter(str(?rawkind),"Kind.") as ?filterKind)} OPTIONAL { ?d e:IEEECigreDLL.PowerElectronicsConnection ?eq. ?d c:IdentifiedObject.mRID ?dllid } } ORDER by ?id
